::Killfest/Scyther::

Killfest shruggs. "Good enough for me," he says, looking around 
again. He then looks at Darkfate. "Do you have a transwarp shuttle 
available for use?"

Scyther, who had been walking behind quietly, looks up at the 
question, waiting for Darkfate's answer. To him, the answer was the 
difference between a quick jump from this planet to his old time and 
a long slow trip through space.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Darkfate::
>

exit,
